Package Controllers

Class EditAppointment

java.lang.Object
Controllers.EditAppointment
public class EditAppointment extends Object
The EditAppointment class manages the functionality for editing an existing appointment in the database.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    goToAppointmentHomepage()
    Loads the Appointment Homepage view and closes the current stage.
    void
    initialize()
    Initializes the form by setting focus on the submit button, setting up the combo boxes, and setting up the time combo boxes.
    void
    setAppointmentData(int appointmentID, String appointmentTitle, String appointmentDescription, String appointmentLocation, String appointmentType, LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime, int customerID, int userID, int contactID)

    void
    setComboBoxes()
    Fetches data from the database and populates the corresponding ComboBoxes
    void
    setTimeComboBoxes()
    Sets the start and end time combo boxes with time slots in 30-minute increments from 00:00 to 23:30.

    Validates and updates the database with the edited appointment.

  • Constructor Details

    • EditAppointment

      public EditAppointment()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws SQLException
      Initializes the form by setting focus on the submit button, setting up the combo boxes, and setting up the time combo boxes.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error retrieving data from the database

    • setAppointmentData

      public void setAppointmentData(int appointmentID, String appointmentTitle, String appointmentDescription, String appointmentLocation, String appointmentType, LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime, int customerID, int userID, int contactID) throws SQLException
      Sets the data for an appointment object and populates the appointment form fields with the given data.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment.
      appointmentTitle - The title of the appointment.
      appointmentDescription - The description of the appointment.
      appointmentLocation - The location of the appointment.
      appointmentType - The type of the appointment.
      startDateTime - The start date and time of the appointment.
      endDateTime - The end date and time of the appointment.
      customerID - The ID of the customer associated with the appointment.
      userID - The ID of the user associated with the appointment.
      contactID - The ID of the contact associated with the appointment.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error retrieving data from the database

    • setComboBoxes

      public void setComboBoxes() throws SQLException
      Fetches data from the database and populates the corresponding ComboBoxes
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error retrieving data from the database

    • setTimeComboBoxes

      public void setTimeComboBoxes()
      Sets the start and end time combo boxes with time slots in 30-minute increments from 00:00 to 23:30.

    • submit

      public void submit() throws IOException, SQLException
      Validates and updates the database with the edited appointment. Returns to Appointment Homepage after successful submission.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error with input/output
      SQLException - if there is an error retrieving data from the database

    • goToAppointmentHomepage

      public void goToAppointmentHomepage() throws IOException
      Loads the Appointment Homepage view and closes the current stage.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the FXML file for the Appointment Homepage view cannot be found.
